review: I love my Chromecast. I actually bought 2 of them after how useful the first one has been. This is a media device that powers up via usb on back of your tv, or it comes with ac adapter to plug in.For me I downloaded and paid for PLEX PASS which lets you stream anything from your pc to chromecast.I also have the following apps installed on my chromecast that I use regulary.HBO GO, Netflix, Plex, Hulu, Youtube, and Google play movies. So honestly to be able to use all of these apps on my TV makes this device such a no brainer.So if you want to rent a movie you can through Google play store which is almost always cheaper than your cable provider!
